page.title: 14LITTLE WITLEY HORTICULTURE-1
page.content: HGFIYOIIO The two{glasshouse}units of Haven Nurseries total 4 acres of fully heated glass, on two different sites. There are{two main crops}, tomatoes and all-the-year-round spray chrysanthemums, with lettuce as a catch crop between October and June. All crops are grown in border soil, growing bags having been discontinued due to their cost.{Glasshouse {construction}is mainly Aluminium with glass cladding and fully automatic vents. Both overhead and drip irrigation is installed, controlled by either automatic electric or computerised controllers. {Heating}is by two 5000000 B.T.U. fully automatic coal fired boilers. The change to coal for energy was necessary in order to continue in business. About 330 tonnes of coal are used by each site.
